content: 3 k6 k2tog fine after knitting a couple of r 5 k5 k2tog row r 7 k4 k2tog for stash busting you can knit r 9 k3 k2tog the neck flap and brim in one r 11 k2 k2tog color and the crown in a second r 13 k1 k2tog color r 14 k2tog 7/8 stitches remain finishing cut yarn leaving about 10 with a tapestry needle thread through the remaining stitches and pull tight if you didn t slip the first stitch and purl the last and even if you did but want an even neater edge you can crochet around the bottom a contrasting color looks nice weave in ends note this pattern creates a jog knit with cascade 220 double in the front of the hat which will stranded be visible if adding stripes or colorwork knitters may want to use jogless stripes or move the jog to knit with cascade eco+ stranded with sock yarn the back if adding a colorwork pattern
